thread.section_title: Rome Style Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: excellent location great hotel
thread.title_full: excellent location great hotel - Review of Rome Style Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Naamap1
title: excellent location great hotel
text:
we have stayed at this hotel for 4 nights on March 2017.
.The hotel is situated close to the Spanish steps and Trevi fountain. all new, Nice breakfast with variety,
Nice rooms (although some rooms do not have a door to the shower room only glass door)
Great staff
